data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Balakirev, Alexander E., Abramov, Alexei V., Rozhnov, Viatcheslav V. (2014): Phylogenetic relationships in the Niviventer-Chiromyscus complex (Rodentia, Muridae) inferred from molecular data, with description of a new species. ZooKeys 451: 109-136, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.451.7210, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.451.7210
